email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic, available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you come down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns on the rate. After discussing with the owners, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 is closer to our target, but we’d like to lock it in at $47.50 if possible. Also, can we extend the laycan to 15-22 October to allow for some flexibility? Let me know if the owners can accommodate. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve just spoken with the owners, and they’ve agreed to your proposed rate of $47.50 per ton. The laycan can also be extended to 15-22 October as requested. Please confirm if we can proceed, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that’s great news. We’re happy to proceed at $47.50 per ton with the extended laycan. Please send over the draft agreement, and we’ll review it promptly. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement shortly. Just to confirm, the terms are: freight rate $47.50 per ton, laycan 15-22 October, laytime 72 hours, and demurrage at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
